vernac_cmds: Definition gamma1 (A : SRS) := map (fun '(x,y) => x / (x ++ [#] ++ y ++ [#])) A.
Definition gamma2 (A : SRS) := map (fun '(x,y) => y / (x ++ [#] ++ y ++ [#])) A.
Fixpoint gamma (A : SRS) := match A with | [] => [] | x/y :: A => gamma A ++ x ++ [#] ++ y ++ [#] end.
Lemma sigma_gamma1 A : sigma # (gamma1 A) = tau1 A ++ [#] ++ gamma A.
Lemma sigma_gamma2 A : sigma # (gamma2 A) = tau2 A ++ [#] ++ gamma A.
Lemma gamma1_spec B C : B <<= gamma1 C -> exists A, A <<= C /\ gamma1 A = B.
assert (x/y el gamma1 C) by firstorder.
assert (B <<= gamma1 C) as (A & Hi & He) % IHB by firstorder.
Lemma gamma2_spec B C : B <<= gamma2 C -> exists A, A <<= C /\ gamma2 A = B.
assert (x/y el gamma2 C) by firstorder.
assert (B <<= gamma2 C) as (A & Hi & He) % IHB by firstorder.
Lemma gamma_inj A1 A2 : ~ # el sym A1 -> ~ # el sym A2 -> gamma A1 = gamma A2 -> A1 = A2.
destruct c, (gamma A2), s; cbn in *; inv H3.
destruct A2 as [ | (x',y')]; cbn in H1.
repeat (autorewrite with list in H1; cbn in H1).
destruct A1 as [ | (x1, y1)], A2 as [ | (x2, y2)]; repeat (cbn in *; autorewrite with list in H2).
exists (fun P => (gamma1 P P, gamma2 P P, fresh (sym P))).
intros (B1 & B2 & (A1 & Hi1 & <-) % gamma1_spec & (A2 & Hi2 & <-) % gamma2_spec & He1 & He2 & H).
eapply list_prefix_inv in H as [H1 <- % gamma_inj].
destruct A1; cbn in *; firstorder congruence.
eapply Hi1 in H0 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi2 in H0 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi1 in H1 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi2 in H1 as ? % fresh_spec.

command: assert (x/y el gamma1 C) by firstorder.
assert (B <<= gamma1 C) as (A & Hi & He) % IHB by firstorder.
assert (x/y el gamma2 C) by firstorder.
assert (B <<= gamma2 C) as (A & Hi & He) % IHB by firstorder.
destruct c, (gamma A2), s; cbn in *; inv H3.
destruct A2 as [ | (x',y')]; cbn in H1.
repeat (autorewrite with list in H1; cbn in H1).
destruct A1 as [ | (x1, y1)], A2 as [ | (x2, y2)]; repeat (cbn in *; autorewrite with list in H2).
exists (fun P => (gamma1 P P, gamma2 P P, fresh (sym P))).
intros (B1 & B2 & (A1 & Hi1 & <-) % gamma1_spec & (A2 & Hi2 & <-) % gamma2_spec & He1 & He2 & H).
eapply list_prefix_inv in H as [H1 <- % gamma_inj].
destruct A1; cbn in *; firstorder congruence.
eapply Hi1 in H0 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi2 in H0 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi1 in H1 as ? % fresh_spec.
eapply Hi2 in H1 as ? % fresh_spec.
